description:
The B-Rank Wars, Round 5 nighttime match where Tamakoma-2, Katori Squad, and Kakizaki Squad face off against each other begins with ace Katori quickly making a ferocious attack on Yuma.
But Osamu and Chika, determined to get in the Away squad to the Neighborhood, have acquired new techniques and devised a brand new team tactic with Yuma. Has their last defeat made them a stronger team? The fateful Rank Wars match has begun!
Source: crunchyroll
